text:
When viewing the HTML produced by JUnitReport, if you drill down to the xxxTest 
itself, you get an error if a property value's string is too long.  My 
classpath is extremely long (generated by filesets upon filesets).  The 
xxxTest.xml is fine (that is the path is complete and terminated with a single 
quote, but the generated HTML truncates the classpath yielding an "unterminated 
string constant" pop-up box in IE 6.0.2800.
creator: dreed2012@yahoo.com

text: *** This bug has been marked as a duplicate of 19301 ***
creator: bodewig@apache.org
